summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json and does not add the required generated logo asset or update the frontend header to use it. REQ-10 is not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate an optimized, round-cropped, transparent 512x512 PNG logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/school-logo-uploaded.dim_512x512.png and update the site header to render it via src="/assets/generated/school-logo-uploaded.dim_512x512.png" (desktop and mobile), with no backend changes.
missing_requirements.reason: No new image asset was added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and no frontend header/component files were modified to change the logo src. The only change is to project_state.json.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state (project_state.json) unrelated to replacing the header logo asset.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is specifically about replacing the site header logo and adding a generated static asset; it does not request changes to project_state.json.
